Class.Name: SearchTrie
Class.Description: Field map with a match row names to an array or rowname, ususally used in data retrieval.

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Finds a word node in the trie

Function.Name: add
Function.Description: Adds a word to the trie

Function.Name: create_node
Function.Description: Overridable function to create a node on the trie
